conbody.p: The spacer is used to separate widgets, such as labels and text fields, within a box. Normally, a box automatically positions its contents. Sometimes, however, you want to position the contents differently.

Using the height property, you can control the separation of the vertical space between widgets in a vertical box. Similarly, the width property lets you control the separation of the horizontal space between widgets in a horizontal box. In the example below, a spacer with a height of 20 was used to separate the Nationality label and the Telephone Number label.
